title: Namete, Kajitte, Tokidoki Medete
original_name: なめて、かじって、ときどき愛でて
sinopse:
Haru Komatsu accidentally puts a love letter in the wrong desk because of an unexpected seat change. Even after she explains the misunderstanding, the guy who received it, handsome Seishirou Onda, instead now declares that she is his girlfriend? Haru is totally against this however...

(Source: Otakumole)
